verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> [and] Song לְךָ֤ דֻֽמִיָּ֬ה <S%H1747><s%> waiteth תְהִלָּ֓ה <S%H8416><s%> Praise אֱלֹ֘הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> for thee O God בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Sion וּ֝לְךָ֗ יְשֻׁלַּם־ <S%H7999><s%> be performed נֶֽדֶר׃ <S%H5088><s%> and unto thee shall the vow

שֹׁמֵ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> O thou that hearest תְּפִלָּ֑ה <S%H8605><s%> prayer עָ֝דֶ֗יךָ <S%H5704><s%> to You כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּשָׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> unto thee shall all flesh יָבֹֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> come

דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> act עֲ֭וֹנֹת <S%H5771><s%> Iniquities גָּ֣בְרוּ <S%H1396><s%> prevail מֶ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> against פְּ֝שָׁעֵ֗ינוּ <S%H6588><s%> against me [as for] our transgressions אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You תְכַפְּרֵֽם׃ <S%H3722><s%> thou shalt purge them away

אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ <S%H835><s%> Blessed תִּֽבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> [is the man whom] thou choosest וּתְקָרֵב֮ <S%H7126><s%> and causest to approach יִשְׁכֹּ֪ן <S%H7931><s%> [unto thee that] he may dwell חֲצֵ֫רֶ֥יךָ <S%H2691><s%> in thy courts נִ֭שְׂבְּעָה <S%H7646><s%> we shall be satisfied בְּט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> with the goodness בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> of thy house קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <S%H6918><s%> [even] of thy holy הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1964><s%> temple

נ֤וֹרָא֨וֹת ׀ <S%H3372><s%> [By] terrible things בְּצֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> in righteousness תַּ֭עֲנֵנוּ <S%H6030><s%> wilt thou answer אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> us O God יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <S%H3468><s%> of our salvation מִבְטָ֥ח <S%H4009><s%> [who art] the confidence כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all קַצְוֵי־ <S%H7099><s%> of all the ends אֶ֝֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְיָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> [upon] the sea רְחֹקִֽים׃ <S%H7350><s%> and of them that are afar off
מֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> setteth fast הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains בְּכֹח֑וֹ <S%H3581><s%> Which by his strength נֶ֝אְזָ֗ר <S%H247><s%> [being] girded בִּגְבוּרָֽה׃ <S%H1369><s%> with power

מַשְׁבִּ֤יחַ ׀ <S%H7623><s%> Which stilleth שְׁא֣וֹן <S%H7588><s%> the noise יַ֭מִּים <S%H3220><s%> of the seas שְׁא֥וֹן <S%H7588><s%> the noise גַּלֵּיהֶ֗ם <S%H1530><s%> of their waves וַהֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> and the tumult לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> of the people

וַיִּ֤ירְא֨וּ ׀ <S%H3372><s%> are afraid יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> They also that dwell קְ֭צָוֹת <S%H7098><s%> coast מֵאוֹתֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H226><s%> at thy tokens מ֤וֹצָֽאֵי־ <S%H4161><s%> thou makest the outgoings בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> of the morning וָעֶ֣רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and evening תַּרְנִֽין׃ <S%H7442><s%> to rejoice

פָּקַ֥דְתָּ <S%H6485><s%> Thou visitest הָאָ֨רֶץ ׀ <S%H776><s%> the earth וַתְּשֹׁ֪קְקֶ֡הָ <S%H7783><s%> and waterest רַבַּ֬ת <S%H7227><s%> it thou greatly תַּעְשְׁרֶ֗נָּה <S%H6238><s%> enrichest פֶּ֣לֶג <S%H6388><s%> it with the river אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> of God מָ֣לֵא <S%H4390><s%> [which] is full מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water תָּכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> thou preparest דְּ֝גָנָ֗ם <S%H1715><s%> them corn כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> thus תְּכִינֶֽהָ׃ <S%H3559><s%> when thou hast so provided

תְּלָמֶ֣יהָ <S%H8525><s%> the ridges רַ֭וֵּה <S%H7301><s%> thereof abundantly נַחֵ֣ת <S%H5181><s%> thou settlest גְּדוּדֶ֑יהָ <S%H1417><s%> ridges בִּרְבִיבִ֥ים <S%H7241><s%> with showers תְּ֝מֹגְגֶ֗נָּה <S%H4127><s%> thereof thou makest it soft צִמְחָ֥הּ <S%H6780><s%> the springing תְּבָרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> thou blessest

עִ֭טַּרְתָּ <S%H5849><s%> Thou crownest שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> the year טוֹבָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H2896><s%> with thy goodness וּ֝מַעְגָּלֶ֗יךָ <S%H4570><s%> and thy paths יִרְעֲפ֥וּן <S%H7491><s%> drop דָּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1880><s%> fatness

יִ֭רְעֲפוּ <S%H7491><s%> They drop נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> [upon] the pastures מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness וְ֝גִ֗יל <S%H1524><s%> rejoice גְּבָע֥וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and the little hills תַּחְגֹּֽרְנָה׃ <S%H2296><s%> on every side

לָבְשׁ֬וּ <S%H3847><s%> are clothed כָרִ֨ים ׀ <S%H3733><s%> The pastures הַצֹּ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> with flocks וַעֲמָקִ֥ים <S%H6010><s%> the valleys יַֽעַטְפוּ־ <S%H5848><s%> also are covered over בָ֑ר <S%H1250><s%> with corn יִ֝תְרוֹעֲע֗וּ <S%H7321><s%> they shout for joy אַף־ <S%H637><s%> yes יָשִֽׁירוּ׃ <S%H7891><s%> they also sing
